definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to notify at a different time/to notify later/to give prior notice

sentences.english: I cabled her, but we've been at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他打電報通知我他很快就會回來。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 這封信要求回覆信件處理通知給寄件者。

sentences.english: I am regretting to have to inform you that two cases of them are so bad in quality.
sentences.chinese: 我們遺憾地通知您，其中兩箱，質量極爲差劣。

sentences.english: Turn off the notification function on your email program.
sentences.chinese: 關掉電子郵件程序的自動通知功能。

sentences.english: Young scene seize turned separate yeongjo, want to notice him about plucking exceedingly senti-mental secrets.
sentences.chinese: 幼景抓住轉身分開的英祖，要通知他關於寒星的機密。

sentences.english: Applications can subscribe to push notifications.
sentences.chinese: 應用可以訂閱推送通知。

sentences.english: The admission notice he received from the university rejoiced his mother's heart.
sentences.chinese: 他收到的大學錄取通知書使他的母親心花怒放。

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 棄置大件玻璃利器時，請通知當值職員協助妥善處理。
請把這個通知用電子郵件發給各位經理。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we have instructed the bank to open the L/C in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 應你方的要求，我們已通知銀行在幾日內開立信用證。

sentences.english: All competition details of the preliminary and final will be informed by post.
sentences.chinese: 有關初賽及決賽之資料及結果將以郵寄方式通知。

sentences.english: Can you tell me the little boy's name ?
sentences.chinese: 你能通知自己阿誰小男孩地名字嗎？

sentences.english: A dispatch confirmation notice was sent to the customer.
sentences.chinese: 向客戶發送派送確認通知。

sentences.english: The leading group is to move back at5 minutes' notice.
sentences.chinese: 先頭小組何時返回，提前五分鐘通知。

sentences.english: Monopoly received a repair call, inform production enterprise or service team.
sentences.chinese: 專賣點接到報修電話後，通知生產企業或服務隊伍。

sentences.english: I further represent that I will notify GMI of any material changes in writing.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我保證將以書面形式通知GMI任何變動情況。

definition: to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
